itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss whether or not College Football can survive all the Covid cancellations in the SEC and BIG 10 and how this will affect the College Football Playoffs.  We also give our Masters winner predictions, College and NFL sp...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss whether or not College Football can survive all the Covid cancellations in the SEC and BIG 10 and how this will affect the College Football Playoffs.  We also give our Masters winner predictions, College and NFL spreads, our UFC predictions for Saturday night, as well as "Dirty Dan's Filthy Picks Of The Week".

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss whether or not College Football can survive all the Covid cancellations in the SEC and BIG 10 and how this will affect the College Football Playoffs.  We also give our Masters winner predictions, College and NFL spreads, our UFC predictions for Saturday night, as well as "Dirty Dan's Filthy Picks Of The Week".
